languages.text: Вольный Торговец Инцендия Чорда взяла контроль над Футфолом, где учинила суд и жестокие расправы над еретиками. Бывший Наместник, Владайм Токара, ушел в подполье и оказывает ей сопротивление. Вмешательство Лорд-капитана может принести победу как одной, так и другой стороне.

traits.locale_text: Вольный Торговец Инцендия Чорда взяла контроль над Футфолом, где она учинила суд и жестокие расправы над еретиками. Чорда потребовала, чтобы Лорд-капитан помог ей найти остатки сопротивления во главе с бывшим Наместником Владаймом и осудить их.

languages.text: Rogue Trader Incendia Chorda has taken control of Footfall and brought her own justice and brutal executions of heretics to the station. The former Liege, Vladaym Tocara, has gone underground to oppose her. The Lord Captain's intervention could secure the victory for one side or the other.
languages.original_text: Вольный Торговец Инцендия Чорда взяла контроль над Футфолом, где учинила суд и жестокие расправы над еретиками. Бывший Наместник, Владайм Токара, ушел в подполье и оказывает ей сопротивление. Вмешательство Лорд-капитана может принести победу как одной, так и другой стороне.

traits.locale_text: Rogue Trader Incendia Chorda has taken control of Footfall and brought her own justice and brutal executions of heretics to the station. The former Liege, Vladaym Tocara, has gone underground to oppose her. The Lord Captain's intervention could secure the victory for one side or the other.

Rogue Trader Incendia Chorda has taken control of Footfall and brought her own justice and brutal executions of heretics to the station. The former Liege, Vladaym Tocara, has gone underground to oppose her. The Lord Captain's intervention could secure the victory for one side or the other.

Rogue Trader Incendia Chorda has taken control of Footfall and brought her own justice and brutal executions of heretics to the station. The former Liege, Vladaym Tocara, has gone underground to oppose her. The Lord Captain's intervention could secure the victory for one side or the other.

Rogue Trader Incendia Chorda has taken control of Footfall and brought her own justice and brutal executions of heretics to the station. The former Liege, Vladaym Tocara, has gone underground to oppose her. The Lord Captain's intervention could secure the victory for one side or the other.

languages.text: Depuis que la libre-marchande Incendia Chorda a pris le contrôle de Castel, tous les hérétiques de la station sont menacés par sa justice implacable et ses exécutions brutales. Vladaym Tocara, l'ancien suzerain, s'est caché pour mettre en place une résistance. L'intervention {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} en faveur de l'un des deux camps assurerait la victoire à ce dernier.
languages.original_text: Rogue Trader Incendia Chorda has taken control of Footfall and brought her own justice and brutal executions of heretics to the station. The former Liege, Vladaym Tocara, has gone underground to oppose her. The Lord Captain's intervention could secure the victory for one side or the other.

traits.locale_text: Depuis que la libre-marchande Incendia Chorda a pris le contrôle de Castel, tous les hérétiques de la station sont menacés par sa justice implacable et ses exécutions brutales. Vladaym Tocara, l'ancien suzerain, s'est caché pour mettre en place une résistance. L'intervention {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} en faveur de l'un des deux camps assurerait la victoire à ce dernier.

languages.text: 因森蒂娅·库尔达已经控制了落脚港。她在这座星站上实施她的正义，对所有异端分子进行了残酷处决。前任总督弗拉迪姆·托卡拉已经躲到了地下，通过游击战反抗她的统治。只要行商浪人介入这场战争，便可以确保其中任何一方获得胜利。
languages.original_text: Rogue Trader Incendia Chorda has taken control of Footfall and brought her own justice and brutal executions of heretics to the station. The former Liege, Vladaym Tocara, has gone underground to oppose her. The Lord Captain's intervention could secure the victory for one side or the other.

traits.locale_text: 因森蒂娅·库尔达已经控制了落脚港。她在这座星站上实施她的正义，对所有异端分子进行了残酷处决。前任总督弗拉迪姆·托卡拉已经躲到了地下，通过游击战反抗她的统治。只要行商浪人介入这场战争，便可以确保其中任何一方获得胜利。

languages.text: 自由開拓者インセンディア・チョーダはフットフォールを掌握し、独自の正義を振りかざし、ステーションにおいて異端者への残忍な処刑制度を採用した。かつての領主ヴラダイム・トカラは、彼女に対抗して地下に姿を消した。ロード・キャプテンの介入により、どちらか一方が勝利する可能性がある。
languages.original_text: Rogue Trader Incendia Chorda has taken control of Footfall and brought her own justice and brutal executions of heretics to the station. The former Liege, Vladaym Tocara, has gone underground to oppose her. The Lord Captain's intervention could secure the victory for one side or the other.

traits.locale_text: 自由開拓者インセンディア・チョーダはフットフォールを掌握し、独自の正義を振りかざし、ステーションにおいて異端者への残忍な処刑制度を採用した。かつての領主ヴラダイム・トカラは、彼女に対抗して地下に姿を消した。ロード・キャプテンの介入により、どちらか一方が勝利する可能性がある。

languages.text: Freihändlerin Incendia Chorda hat die Kontrolle über Footfall übernommen und ihre eigene Form der Gerechtigkeit auf der Station etabliert. Ketzer werden brutal hingerichtet. Der ehemalige Lehnsherr, Vladaym Tocara, ist in den Untergrund gegangen, um eine Widerstandsbewegung gegen sie zu organisieren. Die Intervention des Lord Captains könnte einer Seite den Sieg sichern.
languages.original_text: Rogue Trader Incendia Chorda has taken control of Footfall and brought her own justice and brutal executions of heretics to the station. The former Liege, Vladaym Tocara, has gone underground to oppose her. The Lord Captain's intervention could secure the victory for one side or the other.

traits.locale_text: Freihändlerin Incendia Chorda hat die Kontrolle über Footfall übernommen und ihre eigene Form der Gerechtigkeit auf der Station etabliert. Ketzer werden brutal hingerichtet. Der ehemalige Lehnsherr, Vladaym Tocara, ist in den Untergrund gegangen, um eine Widerstandsbewegung gegen sie zu organisieren. Die Intervention des Lord Captains könnte einer Seite den Sieg sichern.

languages.text: La Comerciante Independiente Incendia Chorda se ha apoderado de Paso y ha impuesto su propia justicia en la estación, lo que incluye brutales ejecuciones de herejes. El antiguo Señor, Vladaym Tocara, se ha escondido para oponerse a ella. La intervención de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán podría ser decisiva para uno u otro bando.
languages.original_text: Rogue Trader Incendia Chorda has taken control of Footfall and brought her own justice and brutal executions of heretics to the station. The former Liege, Vladaym Tocara, has gone underground to oppose her. The Lord Captain's intervention could secure the victory for one side or the other.

traits.locale_text: La Comerciante Independiente Incendia Chorda se ha apoderado de Paso y ha impuesto su propia justicia en la estación, lo que incluye brutales ejecuciones de herejes. El antiguo Señor, Vladaym Tocara, se ha escondido para oponerse a ella. La intervención de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán podría ser decisiva para uno u otro bando.

languages.text: Hür Tacir İncendia Chorda, Binliman'ın kontrolünü eline aldı ve istasyona kendi adalet sistemini getirip kâfirleri canice yok etti. Eski Emîr Vladaym Tocara, ona karşı çıkmak için faaliyetlerine gizlice devam etti. Lord Kaptan'ın müdahalesiyle taraflardan biri galip gelecek.
languages.original_text: Rogue Trader Incendia Chorda has taken control of Footfall and brought her own justice and brutal executions of heretics to the station. The former Liege, Vladaym Tocara, has gone underground to oppose her. The Lord Captain's intervention could secure the victory for one side or the other.
